name: UAC Bypass via ICMLuaUtil
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using ICMLuaUtil Elevated COM interface
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\dllhost.exe AND process.parent.command_line:(\/Processid\:\{3E5FC7F9\-9A51\-4367\-9063\-A120244FBEC7\} OR \/Processid\:\{D2E7041B\-2927\-42FB\-8E9F\-7CE93B6DC937\})) AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\WerFault.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:WerFault.exe)))`
